title: Swain Doesnâ€™t Have a Cane? Why?
body:
I’m actually really upset that they removed Swain’s cane in the rework. As someone who uses a cane on a daily basis, it was so nice to see a champion who also uses a cane. Representation feels good my dudes. I’m just not sure why they felt it was necessary to remove it? Like I GET his lore changed, and I understand that it’s not ~cool~ to have a cane, but I cried tears of happiness when I first found out Swain used a cane, and just don’t understand why they couldn’t have left it in. I know this probably isn’t the most coherent post, but idk this is just really important to me, and I’m sure it’s really important to other people too.

Iâ€™m also not sure if this is posted in the right place, so forgive me.
